import React, { useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Panel, PanelHeader, PanelHeaderBack } from "@vkontakte/vkui"; import "./Offers.css"; import Logo from "../../img/LogoOffers.svg"; import Back from "../../img/chevron-back.svg"; import cardLogo from "../../img/zaimer.png"; import highChance from "../../img/highChance.svg"; import middleChance from "../../img/middleChance.svg"; import lowChance from "../../img/lowChance.svg"; import delimeter from "../../img/delimeter.svg"; const Offers = (props) => { return (

); }; Offers.propTypes = { id: PropTypes.string.isRequired, go: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default Offers;
